DESCRIPTION: The next time you would lose HP, take additional damage equal to Bleeding amount.
Can only spawn in card rewards if your deck contains the associated Lure card. When added to your deck, the corresponding Lure is removed.
While this is in your deck, it's associated Predator card is added to the card reward pool. Lures are removed from the card reward pool while you have a Lure in your deck.
This card cannot be upgraded outside of combat.
Permanently remove this card from your deck.
Prevents the next buff that would be applied to target.
Return a card from your discard pile to your draw pile and upgrade it.
Select a card from your draw pile and discard it.
The next time this enemy would deal damage, prevent damage equal to the ink value, deal that much damage to the enemy, and then remove that much ink.
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
